page.title: 14INDUSTRY IN OUR AREA
page.content: {Freemans}is one of the biggest mail order companies in the country. It orders and delivers a wide range of products including home wear,clothing, toys and furniture hard wear. It also has a shop which has bargains for employees of the company. Another large company in the area is {Peterbrotherhoods,}a light enginering works. It uses metal castings to make its products. Also in the area, is the {Royal Mail {Parcels Depot}. It sorts package and parcels and sends them all over the world. Some pieces of land are owned by the council. They lend them out to small companies such as window replacement companies , hire and security companies.Also in this area , there are some companies dealing in building materials ,such as {Ellis and {Everard}and {Travis and Arnolds}.
